txt.en: DNT
Cariad will be waiting for you outside of Tornhad, south of the river.\n\nYou should meet up with him.
DNT
DNT
Use the whistle to summon TBD to your side
Use the whistle to summon TBD to your side
Find Cariad outside Tornhad
It seems Cariad has not escaped the sharp eyes of the Rangers.\n\nYou should talk to Lagordal outside Tornhad.
With Cariad captured, the next thing to do would be to notify Erlys.\n\nShe can be found in the Cuan-l√ªth Refuge, to the north of Tornhad.
Cariad has decided to take matters into his own hands.

'If we want the Rangers' help, we'll have to tell them why the wizard's spies have come. I'll need you by my side for this; if I go alone, they'll see me as a Dunlending and nothing else. But if they see you as well, they might be more convinced of my peaceful intentions.

'I'll go on ahead. I'll be waiting for you on this side of the river, outside Tornhad.

'Should something happen to me, tell Erlys and don't worry. Like I said, my people are strong, and so am I. I've suffered much worse.'
One Final Wager
Use the whistle to summon TBD to your side
Talk to Erlys
Talk to Lagordal
Before you can enter Tornhad, a familiar voice calls out to you
Help Cariad with 'Tying Up Loose Ends'
DNT
'The arrogance of these Rangers knows no bounds!'

'Halt. [placeholder], what is the meaning of this? Why does this Dunlending claim to know you?'

You explain the circumstances that have led to this point.

'Has it not occurred to you that these people have tried to manipulate you? They and the rest of their kin have fallen to the lies of Saruman. Now they run amok in the Angle! I am sorry; you must have meant well, but I cannot trust this man. Leave him here, so that I may question him.'
DNT
Use the whistle to summon TBD to your side
